dialogues.name: ClassmateC
dialogues.content: Isn't that Vincent? You've already built a good relationship with the new female student so quickly?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: The new student needs to become familiar with the school environment, and I hope that students can help each other.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Not that familiar, just a classmate who was arranged by the teacher to sit next to me.
